channel.title: Server Status Vote Reset
channel.description:
I just put up something that will, at the least, annoy people trying to auto-vote their server up. At the end of this month, I'm going to reset all of the votes to 0 to level out the playing field for those that never cheated. No one who cheated will be banned or removed, however, because I actually support cheating (this community came from a cheating community, after all). Good luck with the reCAPTCHA.
As always, post comments about this change here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html

item.title: Server Status Vote Reset
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I just removed all votes that occurred without first going through reCAPTCHA. That is why votes have changed, thanks!

Read full topic
